snippet.title: ARK Park 2017 Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Newest Trailer of ARK Park - the VR theme park
------------------------------------
An extension of the ARK: Survival Evolved franchise, ARK Park aims to be the most true to life realization of a virtual reality attraction, filled to the brim with fascinating Jurassic creatures and adrenaline pumping gameplay. 

Follow us:
Official Website: http://www.arkparkvr.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ARKParkOfficial
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ArkParkOfficial
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/arkparkofficial/
